message: I'm proposing a fair split.  I get a bit more since I'm taking the risk of making the first offer.  Let's get this started!
I'm trying to be aggressive, but still fair. Your turn!
Let's compromise. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I need a more even split. Let's get this done before we lose too much!
I'm trying to be more realistic now. You're not getting away with all the money!
We're both losing money with each round. Let's meet in the middle this time. It's the best option for both of us.
